testsuite.name: com.ultimateqa.courses.testsuite.LoginPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Click on login[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (cbab65b7d6f3549f404d3e31aa02dd58)] -> xpath: //a[@href='/users/sign_in']] Enter user name[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (cbab65b7d6f3549f404d3e31aa02dd58)] -> id: user[email]] Enter user name[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (cbab65b7d6f3549f404d3e31aa02dd58)] -> name: user[password]] Click on login[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (cbab65b7d6f3549f404d3e31aa02dd58)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Sign in')]] Get Text Message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (cbab65b7d6f3549f404d3e31aa02dd58)] -> xpath: //li[contains(text(),'Invalid email or password.')]]
